name: Dark Theme for Strava
description: Remember to look care of your eyes, not only rest of body. This dark themed style helps your eyes be healthy while visiting Strava. Do you like my style? Please support my work and fund me coffee on Paypal >>> there <<< Also share it with your friends. Thank you for being awesome!
additional_info:
* 4.6 - 05.04.2023 - fixes to inviting friend panel,
* 4.5 - 04.04.2023 - fixes to uploading data,
* 4.4 - 29.03.2023 - fixes to Activities and Maps level chart,
* 4.3 - 26.03.2023 - fixes to profile preview,
* 4.2 - 25.03.2023 - fixes to Feed,
* 4.1 - 20.03.2023 - fixes to training logs,
* 4.0 - 16.03.2023 - fixes to statistics in Feed,
* 3.9 - 03.03.2023 - fixes to Activity,
* 3.8 - 25.02.2023 - fixes to Kudos subpage, private profiles and segments,
* 3.7 - 24.02.2023 - fixes to main page when not logged and to Activity,
* 3.6 - 24.01.2023 - fixes to training logs,
* 3.5 - 03.12.2022 - compatilibity fixes with "Sauce for Strava" addon, login and notifications fixes,
* 3.4 - 01.11.2022 - more fixes to activies,
* 3.3 - 01.11.2022 - fixes to main page, activities and settings,
* 3.2 - 31.08.2022 - fixes to comments,
* 3.1 - 23.08.2022 - fixes to main page, like buttons and activity stats,
* 3.0 - 24.04.2022 - fixes to main page (not logged) and activity icons,
* 2.9 - 23.04.2022 - fixes to Feed again,
* 2.8 - 21.04.2022 - Activity Feed and Profile fixes,
* 2.7 - 20.04.2022 - and few more to Activity Feed,
* 2.6 - 20.04.2022 - fixes to Activity Feed and minor others,
* 2.5 - 15.12.2021 - minor fixes to Feeds, Control Panel and Map,
* 2.4 - 22.09.2021 - fixes to Routes,
* 2.3 - 17.09.2021 - fix to Feed,
* 2.2 - 14.09.2021 - fixes to stats on Map and Settings,
* 2.1 - 06.09.2021 - fixes to photos viewing,
* 2.0 - 29.08.2021 - again calendar fix, classification and comments,
* 1.9 - 27.08.2021 - activity, registry etc. fixes
* 1.8 - 26.08.2021 - calendar fix,
* 1.7 - 26.08.2021 - and more...
* 1.6 - 25.08.2021 - fixed a lot more charts and elements, removed old (mostly now usuned) ,code by phtnq, style is now written from scratch,
* 1.5 - 25.08.2021 - fixed more charts, comments section, notifications,
* 1.4 - 25.08.2021 - and again: Dashboad, stats, charts etc...
* 1.3 - 24.08.2021 - and again many fixes (third time lucky per day),
* 1.2 - 24.08.2021 - and more fixes,
* 1.1 - 24.08.2021 - Well, I didn't used desktop Strava for long time, but now I see people are still using it especially that I received kind request to update it, so new version should be a lot better in main area/activities,
* 1.0 - 01.09.2018 - Initial Release.

Known bugs:
- minor issues with icons of some of activites (can't check them all),
- probably premium activites,
- you tell me
